Uranus.Named: Personification of heaven in ancient myth
Uranus.Discovered: 1781 by William Herschel (was thought previously to be a star)
Uranus.Atmosphere Comp: 83% Hydrogen, 15% Helium, 2.5% Methane, Methane gas causes Uranus's blue color
Uranus.Satellites: Titania, Oberon, Miranda, Ariel, Umbriel, Puck, Cordelia, Ophelia, Bianca, Cressida, Desdemona, Juliet, Portia, Rosalind, Belinda, Perdita, Caliban, Sycorax, Stephano, Prospero, Setebos, Trinculo, Ferdinand, Francisco, Mab, Cupid, Margaret
